strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Hooray for Friday! Here’s a look at the fun awaiting you this weekend. 

  • Psycho for cyclo-cross: The OZCX cycle-cross festival begins today at Centennial Park in Fayetteville and will conclude with the 2022 UCI Cyclo-cross World Cup on Sunday. 
  • Hydrate for life: Run or cycle in the Race to Hydrate 5k, 13k, and youth runs on Saturday morning at the Pinnacle Hills Promenade.
  • You’re killing me, smalls: Roast s’mores and enjoy live music during the Ozarktober Fall Bonfire at Shiloh Square in Downtown Springdale tonight from 6-9p. 
  • Pink as a pig: Get a look at the Razorback Men’s Basketball Team during the Red-White Game on Sunday, Oct 16 at 2p. Attendees can claim free tickets to the Oct 24 exhibition game.
  • Raise a stein: Celebrate Oktoberfest in Downtown Rogers at the craft beer festival on Saturday from 2-6p. 
  • Handmade: You could get a 72-day-head-start on Christmas gift purchases at the War Eagle Fair this weekend (that’s right folks, 72 days til Christmas). 

Have a great weekend, NWA! We’ll be back on Monday.
